resources.string: Please select the same word combination as your partner.
Please place the QR code within the window.
You have chosen the wrong combination.
The key-exchange is executed without any protocol. Depending on the network, this process may take a while. You get notified if the exchange has been finished.
The key-exchange is executed using Diffie-Helmann approach. Depending on the network, this process may take a while. You get notified if the exchange has been finished.
The key-exchange is executed using JPAKE approach. Please enter a password to proceed.
The key-exchange is executed using a hash commitment approach. Depending on the network, this process may take a while and requires further user input. You get notified if user input is necessary.
No key has been exchanged before. The exchange proceeds with a non-authenticated key-exchange. If this finishes, you can proceed with the QR code verification.
You can verify the security key of you partner. Please scan the QR code to proceed.
The key-exchange is executed using NFC. Please place your device next to the device of your partner and confirm the action by pushing the display.
Your partner wants to exchange a key using JPAKE. Please enter a password.
An error occurred. The key-exchange has been aborted.
Please enter a password for the key-exchange.
You have entered a wrong password.
The new key does not match the existing one.
The received key is different to the existing one. Which key should be stored?
The new key has been discarded.
The generation of the key-pair is still in progress.
Should the existing key get deleted?
Do you want to re-use this approach again?
Use the camera to verify the received public key using a QR code.
To beam your public key to another device using NFC, just bring the devices together and touch your display afterwards.
